title: Shards of Glass
description: I wanted him to love me. To the point of obsession. He filled my dreams, my waking hours, my fantasies. Brooding, controlling, sexy-as-sin Daniel Glass: my director, my mentor, my teacher. The uncompromising, award winning billionaire, the talent everyone gave their right arm to work with. He invaded every part of me.But he was off-limits.Unrequited love can get to you, you know. It can eat at your soul. Meet the right man at the wrong time and you're screwed.But then everything changed when I was offered the leading role in the steamy Hollywood movie, The Dark Edge of Love, with Daniel, once again as my director. For the first time ever the chance to get intimate with him was mine for the taking.But there were ghosts from his past. Secrets. Lies.Obsession can be dangerous.Glass can cutâ€¦
author: Arianne Richmonde
